headline: UBS Affirms Buy Rating on Arch Capital Group Ltd and $124 Price Target
summary: Arch Capital Group Ltd (NASDAQ:ACGL) is one of the most undervalued financial stocks to buy, according to analysts. On June 11, UBS reiterated a Buy rating on the stock with a $124 price target. The bullish stance underscores confidence in the company’s ability to deliver solid premium growth, attractive underwriting margins, and increased capital return. […]
